"Fancy quotes" are 'cool', even in the '80s!
Je t' aime. You're a funny one! Thomas' name
Mark's name. "...you"
"'Nested' quotes are 'possible'", too!
'"Otherway" is "round"'!

'Opening now!'

'80s are really cool.

<em>Cluster</em>'s Last Stand.
